com.smartnsoft.droid4me.app
Class SmartCommands.SmartThreadPoolExecutor

java.lang.Object
  java.util.concurrent.AbstractExecutorService
      java.util.concurrent.ThreadPoolExecutor
          com.smartnsoft.droid4me.app.SmartCommands.SmartThreadPoolExecutor
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.util.concurrent.Executor, java.util.concurrent.ExecutorService
Enclosing class:
SmartCommands
public static final class SmartCommands.SmartThreadPoolExecutor
extends java.util.concurrent.ThreadPoolExecutor

Introduced so as to be able to catch the exceptions thrown in the framework thread pools.

Since:
2010.03.02

Method Detail

execute

public void execute(android.app.Activity activity,
                    java.lang.Runnable command)
The same method as execute(Runnable) except that it transfers the activity to the ActivityController.ExceptionHandler when an exception occurs.

Parameters:
activity - the activity which is responsible for running the piece of code
command - the piece of code to execute

execute

public void execute(SmartCommands.GuardedCommand guardedCommand)
Executes the given command. Should be used when the Runnable may throw an Exception.

Parameters:
guardedCommand - the command to run

execute

public void execute(java.lang.Runnable command)
Deprecated. should not be used!

Just calls its @{link #execute(Activity, Runnable)} counterpart, with a null activity.

Specified by:
execute in interface java.util.concurrent.Executor
Overrides:
execute in class java.util.concurrent.ThreadPoolExecutor
